help.if-medical-emergency: If you are having a medical emergency, please call 911
help.if-technical-difficulties: If you are having technical difficulties and need assistance, please call XXX-XXX-XXXX or email xxxxxx@gmail.com
help.recoding: Select this button when you would like to start recording your neural activity from your RC+S implanted device. Recording will not affect your stimulation therapy in any way. Whenever you’re ready, you can choose to stop recording by pressing the “stop recording” button on the screen.

status.here-is-the-current-status: Aqui está o status atual do seu dispositivo RC + S
